DOC.brief_summary: This blind cross-over study aim evaluate efficacy topical liposome-encapsulated lidocaine oral mucosa .
DOC.brief_title: Liposomal Lidocaine Gel Oral Topical Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: This blind cross-over study aim evaluate efficacy topical liposome-encapsulated 2,5 5 % lidocaine gel formulation palatal mucosa .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers free cardiac , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , neurological , gastrointestinal haematological disease , psychiatric disorder allergy local anesthetic
